review.comment: I was referred to James by a friend few years back. Even before I’m engaging him for any property search or sales, I have been asking him for some property related information. He has been very helpful. Recently, I engage him to sell my condo. Throughout the process, he was trying to understand my need and sold my unit within a week. He share a lot of property market information with me to ensure he give me the right knowledge before proceed to purchase of a new property. He is reliable with the professional knowledge and opinion. Highly recommended
review.review_reply: Thank you Ms Lee for your kind recommendation!

review.comment: Very dedicated and passionate in his provision of real estate advice to his clients - even before any conclusion of deals by him.  Highly recommended agent to engage !
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind review!

review.comment:
I met James when I was looking to purchase my first investment property. He is extremely knowledgeable and educate me on the current property climate. I learn a lot from him as he is not focus on selling a property to me but want to give me the right knowledge first.
After learning from him where all the good properties in Singapore are located at, he brought me to see all the properties and give me his professional opinion on each and every one of them.
It is my pleasure to recommend Mr. James Lim as a top real estate agent. He always tried his best and was ready with excellent advice. We recommend him for his expertise, experience and integrity.
Thank you for your hard work, dedication, guidance and most of all for being a good friend and if there is any need in the future, I will be calling on you.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind review! Let's review your property purchase every 6 months or yearly to be kept updated with the latest market trends and updates. You got a very good deal on your property!

review.comment:
I met James when I was looking for a place. He is very helpful and respond to my messages very fast. Everything I have any problems, he will reply back to me and get things sorted out for me, examples like arranging for repairs of the fridge or the air-conditioner.
It is my pleasure to recommend Mr. James Lim as a top real estate agent. He always tried his best and was ready with excellent advice. We would not hesitate to recommend the professional service, expertise, experience and integrity offered by James Lim.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind review Tomasz, hope you enjoy your stay in Singapore!

review.comment: James helped us rent an executive HDB unit last year. He is thorough with his job, prompt with his actions and proactively provides solutions to customer's needs. Thanks to his help, we had  a smooth experience, including handover, at the unit. Thanks James!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Parvej for the nice review! Hope to catch up again soon with you!

review.comment: I was referred to James by a Friend and did not regret on the referral. He is professional and knowledgeable. He takes time to discuss your financials, your aspirations of owning a property before introducing you to your dream house. Thank you James.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind review!

review.comment:
I have never come across an agent like James :) Not only is he super sincere, he is also very meticulous and thoughtful. He is very professional and always think alot for his clients.

I can 100% trust James knowing from the way he work, he is always on the ball,  he never fail to follow up and update me on the status of my investment and rental.

James will be my sole agent because I know I can never find another agent as capable and efficient as him.  Good job James, continue your good work and in my heart,  ur the best agent :)
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind review!
